meanings.sent1: The unthawed ice cream was too hard to scoop.
meanings.sent2: The unthawed meat needed more time to defrost.
meanings.sent3: The unthawed popsicle stuck to my tongue!
meanings.sent4: Her unthawed emotions remained cold and distant.
meanings.sent5: The unthawed lake glistened in the winter sun.

meanings.definition: To not thaw; to remain frozen.
meanings.sent1: I accidentally unthawed the chicken in the freezer.
meanings.sent2: The fish unthawed quickly in the warm water.
meanings.sent3: He unthawed the ice cream to use it as a cold pack.
meanings.sent4: Time seemed to unthawed as she waited for the news.
meanings.sent5: The unthawed river refused to yield to the spring thaw.
